title: Moon to Dust
creator_credit: Kanlaya Padungsin and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
brief_description: Winner of ‘Best Character Animation’ for RMIT’s AIM Graduate Screenings, 2009. Set to the song of the same name by Georgia Fields, ‘Moon to Dust’ is a beautiful and melancholic rendering of belonging, isolation and change.
